report.title: Trait Overviews
report.description: A report which displays all the traits of a particular trait type or list of types associated with a sample.
report.query: select #columns# from ( select #sample_id# as "sample_id", '#sample_type#' as "sample_type", t.id as "trait_term_id", t.parent_id as "parent_term_id", t.term as "trait", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) as "count", ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id as "trait_attr_id", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) * 100 / ( select count(distinct ttlsub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlsub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub on avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlsub.id and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id and avsub.int_value=t.id ) as "rep" from taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav join cache_termlists_terms t on t.id=ttlav.int_value join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# where ttlav.deleted=false #filters# group by t.id, t.parent_id, t.term, ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id ) as sub

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.website_id in (#website_ids#) and o.survey_id=(select survey_id from samples where id=#sample_id#) and o.sample_id=#sample_id# and o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id

join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl2 on cttl2.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl2.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id=#sample_id#

param.name: trait_attr_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of traits to return

param.name: exclude_attr_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of traits to exclude

column.name: rep
column.sql: case when sub.rep<1 then '<1' else round(sub.rep)::varchar end
